name: aaasaasa-web-client-monorepo
description: Aaasaasa Web Client Monorepo by Aleks

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n NUXT,ELECTRON "pnpm -C app dev" "pnpm -C electron dev:wait"
scripts.pack:linux: pnpm -C electron exec electron-builder -l AppImage deb
scripts.pack:win: pnpm -C electron exec electron-builder -w nsis portable
scripts.build:linux: pnpm run build:app && pnpm run prepack:electron && pnpm run pack:linux
scripts.build:win: pnpm run build:app && pnpm run prepack:electron && pnpm run pack:win
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:app && pnpm run prepack:electron && pnpm run pack:all
scripts.verify:asar: pnpm -C electron exec asar extract release/linux-unpacked/resources/app.asar /tmp/app-asar && jq -r .main /tmp/app-asar/package.json && test -f /tmp/app-asar/main.cjs && echo OK
scripts.verify: pnpm run verify:renderer && pnpm run verify:asar
scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml app/node_modules electron/node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.bootstrap: pnpm -C app install && pnpm -C electron install
